categories: Peak Comfort AirGrid Warm 1/4 Zip Baselayer
description:
Wicking coverage and mid-weight warmth when you're working hard in cold weather. The quarter zip provides ventilation options and the wicking fabric moves sweat away from your body to prevent chills.Wicking polyester and spandex with a brushed back for warmth and some stretch.Polygiene anti-odour control lets you wear it more and wash it less.Flatlock seams provide a chafe-free wear.Slim fit for easy layering.Includes a small polyester bag for convenient packing.
